This game Cs:go is just amazing!
If anyone loves playing fps first shooter game he should give csgo a try. The new arms deal update has made it even more fun.
I would extremely recommend this game, not because I'm a huge fan of counter-strike but this game is really worth it. What would be better than playing Counter strike with graphics of battle field 3?

The new match making system makes it even more fun and now players could choose wheter to go serious and play competetive or play classic mode. The game is just near perfect.
Es como la droga... aunque intente dejarla no puedo.
It takes a little bit to get used to it, and there is a learning curve, but there's a reason it's the top game on Steam.  It's pretty fun.  I even paid for the trusted option.

Este me parece a mi, un juego muy divertido y dinamico, pero sobre todo competitivo.
Es un juego con el cual yo mejore mi ´´AIM´´ en los Shooters en PC, no tengo el mejor ´´AIM´´ del mundo mas sin  embargo, puedo decir que tengo una buena puntería. 
Un juego donde los disparos y la accion son constantes sin descanzo. 10/10 recomendados
